com.objetdirect.tatami.client.grid
Interface GridListener

public interface GridListener

This interface describes a GridListener, which is notified each time an event occurs on the grid.

Author:
rdunklau

Method Summary
 void onCellClick(Grid grid, int rowIndex, int colIndex, java.lang.String colField)
          This method is called each time an onCellClick event is fired
 void onCellDblClick(Grid grid, int rowIndex, int colIndex, java.lang.String colField)
           
 void onDataChange(Grid grid, Item itemWhichChanged, java.lang.String attributeName, java.lang.Object oldValue, java.lang.Object newValue)
          This method is called each time an onDataChange event is fired, that is, every time an item changed one of his attribute in the underlying datastore.
 void onSelectionChanged(Grid grid)
          This method is called each time an onSelectionChanged event is fired, that is, every time a row is selected or unselected To get the actual selection , please use Grid.getSelectedIndexes() for the row indexes or Grid.getSelectedItems() for the actual items represented by the selected rows
 

Method Detail

onCellClick

void onCellClick(Grid grid,
                 int rowIndex,
                 int colIndex,
                 java.lang.String colField)
This method is called each time an onCellClick event is fired

Parameters:
grid - : the grid on wich the event occured
rowIndex - : the row index on which the user clicked
colIndex - : the column index on which the user clicked
colName - : the field assigned to the column which was clicked

onSelectionChanged

void onSelectionChanged(Grid grid)
This method is called each time an onSelectionChanged event is fired, that is, every time a row is selected or unselected To get the actual selection , please use Grid.getSelectedIndexes() for the row indexes or Grid.getSelectedItems() for the actual items represented by the selected rows

Parameters:
grid - : the grid on which the event occured

onDataChange

void onDataChange(Grid grid,
                  Item itemWhichChanged,
                  java.lang.String attributeName,
                  java.lang.Object oldValue,
                  java.lang.Object newValue)
This method is called each time an onDataChange event is fired, that is, every time an item changed one of his attribute in the underlying datastore.

Parameters:
grid - : the grid on which the event occured
itemWhichChanged - : the item from which one value has changed
attributeName - : the name of the attribute which has changed
oldValue - : the previous attribute value
newValue - : the new attribute value

onCellDblClick

void onCellDblClick(Grid grid,
                    int rowIndex,
                    int colIndex,
                    java.lang.String colField)
